EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New in 8.4 - APAC - 2015.05.27.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: What’s New in 8.4
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.4
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis would like to welcome the spring season by presenting our new 8.4 Release! We are offering an exclusive sneak peek of all the cool new features in our upcoming ‘What’s new’ Webinar. Join us as our Co-Managing Directors of Asia-Pacific, Dominik Weissboeck and Thomas Hadorn, introduce the new features, including how to:
- Reduce maintenance efforts by establishing Relations between attributes in Test Case Design - Visualize your test case as a flow diagram by using the new Control Flow feature - Help accelerate the automation of business processes with the SAP ECC Accelerator Package - Improve your CI environment by using Tosca Connect (powered by TasktopTM) - Test web apps with Mobile+
Our ‘What’s New’ Webinar will take place on May 21, 2015 starting at 4:00pm CET. Don’t miss out!
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/webinar-whats-new-in-tosca-testsuite-8-4-apac?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/webinar-whats-new-in-tosca-testsuite-8-4-apac?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Wed, May 27, 2015 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. (Sydney) 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. (Perth, Singapore) 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. (New Zealand)
Thomas Hadorn Co-Managing Director of Asia-Pacific Tricentis
Dominik Weisbock Co-Managing Director of Asia-Pacific Tricentis
